on reading compounds: 死【シ】death, decease, death penalty (by strangulation or decapitation), (an) out
病死【ビョウシ】death from disease, death from illness
kun reading compounds: 死ぬ【しぬ】to die, to pass away, to lose spirit, to lose vigor, to look dead, to cease, to stop
死ぬ気で【しぬきで】all out, like hell, like crazy, desperately, expecting to die
